featured.text: Publicly financed projects are often ______ or delayed during tough economic times due to a lack of resources.
The non-profit organization has _____ $1 million over five years to finance the construction of the medical center.

definition.zh_def: 金融：管理資金的科學和藝術，包括投資、借貸和資本管理。
definition.en_def: The management of large amounts of money, especially by governments or large companies.
definition.example: She decided to study finance to better understand how to manage her investments.
